data.title: Jesse Ventura Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Jesse Ventura on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Jesse Ventura including Predator, The Running Man, and more.
data.text:
Payback

Reno (Lorenzo Lamas) poses as a wrangler at a horse ranch owned by Jessica Patterson (Nancy Everhard), seeking revenge against her ex-husband, a sadistic killer.

Killer In a Halloween Mask

Hunter and McCall become involved in a string of bizarre murders when they're assigned as technical advisors for a television show.

The Usual Suspects

Hunter leads a massive police operation to find dozens of prisoners set free by a computer operator who wants one of them to kill her husband.
